title: Teacher-researcher-based online professional development: Exploring mathematics pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental proficiency in online learning tools
context.additional_context: An online teacher-research-based course for strengthening corporate mathematics instruction competencies. Applies inquiry-based learning and the CoI (Community of Inquiry) framework in a mobile environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain online research methods utilizing the three elements of the CoI framework (teaching, social, and cognitive presence).
Learners can design and implement small-scale research projects to improve mathematics pedagogy in mobile environments.
Learners can share research findings and provide feedback with peer teachers using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
